itemlist.title: Greek Salad
itemlist.description: The famous Greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago styled feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic, rosemary croutons.

itemlist.title: Bruschetta
itemlist.description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil; made perfect for an evening dinner.

itemlist.title: Lemon Dessert
itemlist.description: This comes straight from Grandma's recipe book. Every last ingredient has been sourced and is as authentic as can be imagined.
